altTitles.ja: 恐怖のモンスター
ひびちかタイム
アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

altTitles.ja: ソニック・ザ・ヘッジホッグ

description.en:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations

title.en: Osananajimi to wa LoveCome ni Naranai

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染とはラブコメにならない

altTitles.th: ไม่มีทางที่มันจะกลายเป็นเลิฟคอมเมดี้กับยัยเพื่อนสมัยเด็กหรอก

altTitles.zh-hk: 和青梅竹馬之間不會有戀愛喜劇

altTitles.ar: لا مزيد من الحب مع الفتيات.

altTitles.vi: Làm Gì Có Chuyện Tình Hài Hước Giữa Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Được!

altTitles.en: It Won't Become A Romcom With Childhood Friends

altTitles.ja: No more love with the girls.

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi to wa Love Comedy ni Naranai
Osananajimi to wa Romcom ni Naranai

description.en: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out… it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!! A sweet and irritating love triangle romcom ♡ where you can't be honest!
description.ja: 高校生男子・えーゆーの悩み。それは、二人の幼馴染「しお」と「あかり」が可愛すぎること! 向こうにその気はないのに、俺だけがオトナになった二人をエッチな目で見てるなんてバレたら…ハズすぎる! 一方、実は二人もえーゆーのことが…!? ヒロイン全員、幼馴染!! じれったい! ややこしい!! けど幼馴染って超最高っ!!!
description.th: เอยู (A.U.) หนุ่มมอปลายที่กำลังพบปัญหาใหญ่! ปัญหานั่นก็คือเพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคน "ชิโอ" และ "อาการิ" ที่อยู่โรงเรียนเดียวกันนั้นน่ารักเกินต้าน! ถ้าหากทั้งสองรู้ว่าเขาได้มองพวกเธอที่เติบโตขึ้นมาอย่างสมส่วนด้วยสายตาลามก (ถึงแม้จะไม่ได้ตั้งใจ) ล่ะก็มีหวังแย่แน่! ในทางกลับกัน เพื่อนสมัยเด็กทั้งสองคนนั้นเองก็มีความลับของตนเอง...!? ทั้งหยอกเย้า! ทั้งทำให้สับสน!! ถึงจะอย่างนั้นเพื่อนสมัยเด็กนี่แหละยอดที่สุด!!! เลิฟคอมเมดี้รักสามเส้าแสนหวานที่พูดตรง ๆ ไม่ได้♡

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I Got to Remote Class, I Had to Move in With the Most Beautiful Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

altTitles.es-la: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.es: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.tr: Uzaktan Eğitime Başladığımda, Sınıfımdaki En Güzel Kızla Aynı Eve Taşınmak Zorunda Kaldım

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night. She is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet, and asks him to help. He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!

The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!
description.es: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.ja:
とある感染症が蔓延し、学生寮が閉鎖となって途方に暮れていた高校生・吉野叶多は、
夜中の公園で一人スマホを振り回すという奇行を見せるクラス1の美少女・星川遥と出会った。
機械音痴でネット接続の仕方がわからないと語る星川に助けを求められ、
家をお邪魔した吉野だったが、実は彼女には秘めた目的があって──！？
誘い受け上手なお嬢様とはじめる、イチャ甘同居ラブコメディ開幕！
description.es-la: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Kanata Yoshino, que estava perdendo o juízo, conhece Haruka Hoshikawa, a garota mais bonita da sua turma, que estava agitando seu smartphone sozinha em um parque no meio da noite. Ela é ruim com máquinas e não sabe se conectar à internet, e pede ajuda a ele. Ele acaba visitando a casa dela, mas ele mal sabe que ela tem um propósito secreto...!

A doce e romântica comédia de amor de coabitação começa com o habilidoso convite da jovem!

altTitles.ja: 月刊少女野崎くん

altTitles.es: Nozaki y su revista mensual para chicas

altTitles.th: นักเขียนหน้าตายนายโนซากิคุง

description.ar: تدور أحداث القصة تشيو ساكورا هي طالبة في المدرسة الثانوية، معجبة بزميلها أوميتارو نوزاكي، عندما تعترف بحبها له، يظن أنها معجبة ويعطيها توقيعه عندما تقول له إنها تريد أن تكون معه، يدعوها إلى منزله ويساعدها في تعلم رسم. تكتشف ساكورا أن نوزاكي هو في الواقع فنان شوجو مانغا مشهور يعمل تحت الاسم المستعار ساكيكو يومينو، توافق على أن تكون مساعدته من أجل الاقتراب منه.
description.de:
Chiyo Sakura ist hoffnungslos in ihren Klassenkameraden Nozaki verliebt. Doch als sie ihm ihre Liebe gesteht, gibt Nozaki ihr ein Autogramm, lädt sie zu sich nach Hause ein… und drückt ihr einen Pinsel in die Hand.

Zu ihrer Überraschung entpuppt sich Sakuras Schwarm als berühmter Mangazeichner, der romantische Liebesgeschichten für Mädchen zeichnet! Um ihm näherzukommen, beginnt Sakura, als seine Assistentin zu arbeiten. Und eh sie sich versieht, steht ihr Alltag auf dem Kopf…
description.en:
The boy of her dreams… is a girl's manga artist? To the eyes of high school student Chiyo Sakura, classmate Umetarou Nozaki–brawny of build and brusque of tongue - is a dreamboat! When Chiyo finally works up the courage to tell Nozaki how she feels about him, she knows rejection is on the table… but getting recruited as a manga-ka's assistant?! Never in a million years!

But for someone who makes a living drawing sweet girly romances, Nozaki-kun is a little slow on the uptake when it comes to matters of the heart in reality. And so Chiyo's daily life of manga making and heartache begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/125)
description.es:
Aquel estudiante de bachillerato un poco brusco era dibujante de manga shôjo romántico.

Umetarô Nozaki es un estudiante un poco brusco. Chiyo Sakura, que también estudia bachillerato, está enamorada de él y un día hace acopio de valor y se le declara. Sin embargo, por algún extraño motivo, en vez de convertirse en su chica, pasa a ser su asistente de manga shôjo. ¡Una comedia que narra el día a día de Nozaki, que, aunque es estudiante, también es un mangaka popular!
description.fr: La lycéenne Chiyo Sakura est tombée amoureuse d'Umetarou Nozaki, un grand jeune homme à l'air imperturbable, voire benêt. Lorsqu'elle lui confesse ses sentiments, il la prend pour une de ses fans et lui fait un autographe. Lorsqu'elle lui dit vouloir toujours être à ses côtés, il l'invite dans son appartement et lui donne du travail à faire. Chiyo découvre que Nozaki est en fait un mangaka renommé, qui écrit sous le pseudonyme Sakiko Yumeno. Elle accepte de devenir son assistante en espérant pouvoir se rapprocher de lui. En travaillant sur son shoujo manga *Let's Fall in Love*, Chiyo rencontre d'autres camarades qui apportent leur aide ou servent d'inspiration à Nozaki-kun pour ses personnages.
description.id:
A, aku mau menembak cowok yang kusuka. Tapi saat berhadapan dengannya, yang keluar malah lain.

Tapi akhirnya, yang kudapat darinya adalah sebuah tanda tangan!?
Lho, lhoo..ternyata dia komikus komik cewek!?
description.it: Il ragazzo dei suoi sogni... è un disegnatore di manga per ragazze? Agli occhi della studentessa Chiyo Sakura, il suo compagno di classe Nozaki –rissoso, muscoloso e dalla lingua tagliente- è un vero sogno! Quando decide di dichiarargli, finalmente, i suoi sentimenti si aspetta di essere respinta… ma finire a fare l'assistente di un mangaka? Ma neanche in un milione di anni! Ma per qualcuno che si guadagna da vivere scrivendo di batticuori e patemi d'amore, Nozaki è… un po' lento di comprendonio per quanto riguarda la realtà. E così la vita di Chiyo, tra manga e amore, ha finalmente inizio...
description.ja:
無骨な男子高校生は、乙女な少女漫画家でした。

無骨な男子高校生「野崎梅太郎」。彼に恋をした女子高生「佐倉千代」は勇気を振り絞って告白するものの、何故か恋人ではなく少女漫画家のアシスタントになったのでした…。男子高校生でありながら人気少女漫画家でもある野崎くんの日常を描く、少女漫画家男子コメディー!!
description.ko: 과묵하고 듬직한 남고생 노자키 군. 그런 노자키를 남몰래 짝사랑하던 사쿠라 치요는 용기내어 고백을 하지만 돌아오는 것은 노자키의 사인이었는데…?
description.pl:
Nieokrzesany licealista okazuje się być autorem niewinnych mang shojo!
Chiyo Sakura zbiera się na odwagę i postanawia wyznać miłość Umetarou Nozakiemu, nieoględnemu licealiście, ale zamiast zostać jego dziewczyną, dostaje angaż w charakterze asystentki i od tej chwili razem tworzą komiksy. Oto komedia opowiadająca o codziennym życiu Nozakiego, profesjonalnego mangaki specjalizującego się w shojo!
description.pt:
Sakura Chiyo confessa seu amor pelo Nozaki-kun, mas ele a confunde como uma fã! Incapaz de transmitir seus sentimentos, as coisas começam a ficar complicadas quando Nozaki-kun a convida para ir à sua casa, onde ela descobre que ele é um mangaká de mangá shoujo. Sakura então decide ser a assistente de Nozaki-kun, a fim de se aproximar dele. Agora, Sakura tem que transmitir os seus verdadeiros sentimentos enquanto a sua relação com Nozaki se desenvolve!  


---
description.ru: Сакура пытается признаться Нозаки, а он дает ей автограф. Странно? Вовсе нет, ведь потом он сразу приглашает её домой, где Сакуру ждет сюрприз! Забавная история о парне, который рисует сёдзё, хотя совсем не выглядит знатоком девичьих сердец, и девушке, что всеми силами старается донести до него свои чувства.
description.th: นักเรียนมัธยมปลายหญิงชื่อซากุระ จิโยะแอบชอบเพื่อนร่วมห้องชายชื่อโนซากิ อุเมะทาโร่ แต่เมื่อซากุระสารภาพรักกับโนซากิ โนซากิกลับเข้าใจผิดว่าซากุระเป็นแฟนคลับจึงมอบลายเซ็นให้ เมื่อซากุระบอกว่าตนอยากอยู่เคียงข้างโนซากิ โนซากิก็เชิญซากุระมาที่บ้านแล้วให้ซากุระช่วยเขียนการ์ตูน ซากุระจึงได้รู้ว่าจริง ๆ แล้วโนซากิเป็นนักเขียนการ์ตูนแนวโชโจะชื่อดังที่ใช้นามปากกว่าว่ายูเมโนะ ซากิโกะ ซากุระยอมรับการเป็นผู้ช่วยเขียนการ์ตูนเพื่อให้ใกล้ชิดโนซากิ ระหว่างที่ทั้งคู่ร่วมทำงานเขียนการ์ตูนเรื่อง จงรัก. ก็ได้พบกับเพื่อนร่วมโรงเรียนคนอื่น ๆ ที่มาร่วมช่วยเขียนการ์ตูน และ/หรือเป็นแรงบันดาลใจให้เรื่องราวในการ์ตูน
description.tr: Sakura Chiyo,aşık olduğu Nozaki-kun'a hislerini söylemeye çalışır. Ama sıradan bi lise öğrencisi gibi görünen aslında ünlü bir Mangaka olan Nozaki onu bir fan'ı sanır.
description.vi:
Nam sinh cấp ba khô khan lại là tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ lãng mạn!

Nozaki Umetaro là một nam sinh cấp ba khô khan. Cô bạn Sakura Chiyo thích cậu và đã dồn hết can đảm để tỏ tình. Nhưng không hiểu sao cô không trở thành người yêu, mà thành trợ lý bất đắc dĩ cho cậu tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ này. Kể từ đó, hàng loạt tình huống khó hiểu, thậm chí… khó đỡ liên tiếp xảy đến.

Đây là câu chuyện hài hước về cuộc sống thường ngày của Nozaki, một nam sinh cấp ba đồng thời cũng là tác giả truyện tranh thiếu nữ nổi tiếng.
description.zh:
粗犷的高中男生，其实是纯情的少女漫画家。

女高中生佐仓千代喜欢同班的粗线条男生野崎梅太郎。她鼓起勇气向野崎表白，不知何故没有成为对方的恋人，反而成为了少女漫画家的助手……

描绘拥有双重身份的野崎君，身兼男高中生及人气少女漫画家的日常生活。男子少女漫画家的喜剧开演！
description.zh-hk:
粗獷的男高中生「野崎梅太郎」。 
暗戀他的女高中生「佐倉千代」雖然鼓起勇氣告白，
但不僅求愛未果，還陰錯陽差成為少女漫畫家的助手……
描繪具有雙重身分的野崎同學，高中男生兼人氣少女漫畫家的日常生活。
少女漫畫家男子喜劇!!

altTitles.es-la: La chica hiena está destrás de mi.

altTitles.ja: ハイエナちゃんに狙われて

description.en: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."
description.tr: Uzak mesafe kız arkadaşımın şehirden yaşça büyük yeni biriyle sevgili olduğunu öğrendim ve ben umutsuzluğun pençesindeyken Haibara Enako adında, diğer adıyla "Hyena-chan" olarak anılan bir kız aniden karşıma çıktı ve bana açıldı, " Erkek arkadaşım yok ve şu anda boşum."
description.pt-br: Após um término de namoro recente, nosso protagonista é abordado por Enako Haibara, também conhecida como “Hiena”…

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

title.en: The Reason She Is Avoiding Her Childhood Friend

altTitles.en: The Reason Why That Young Lady Avoids Her Childhood Friend
The Reason I Keep Avoiding My Childhood Friend

altTitles.es-la: La razón por la cual sigo evitando a mi amigo de la infancia

description.en:
Arendine is a reincarnator who died miserably in her past life.

“I’ll live a full life this time around!” I vowed. However, an eight-year-old Grand Duke won’t stop disturbing my peaceful life.

Unable to deal with that jerk any longer, I was forced to take drastic measures by slapping him. At first, he was absolutely livid, ordering me to be whipped. But after that whole incident blew over, his reaction was… A little strange.

“I’ll let you hit me from now on. You can hit me as much as you want.”

Why is he blushing and talking nonsense?

I seem to have awakened his secret taste! Gotta get rid of this guy ASAP!

title.en: Transmigrated as the Masked Boss's Sister

altTitles.en: Transmigrating as the Younger Sister of a Bigshot With Multiple Identities

altTitles.zh: Chuan Cheng Majia Da Lao De Meimei

description.en: Dear Villainesses, you lost your fiancé and I lost my one billion! Just when I had received news that I inherited my family's assets, I immediately transmigrated into a cookie cutter villainess story, as the hated villainess right after "I" made enemies of everyone in the story! Now witness me slither my way into everyone's heart and reach the ending of the story in one piece!

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

description.en: Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

title.en: MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA Piece in Paradise

altTitles.ja: 教えてメルブラ道場！ ～都古とはじめての格ゲー～

altTitles.ja-ro: Oshiete Merubura Dōjō! ~ Miyako to hajimete no kakugē ~

altTitles.en: Teach me Melty Blood Dojo! ~ Miyako's first fighting game ~
Teach Me MB Dojo! ~ Miyako’s First Fighting Game ~

description.en:
The curtain rises on Shiki's feverish Melty Blood battle!

Tohno Shiki and Arima Miyako challenge 'Melty Blood: Type Lumina', the fighting game based on 'Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon-'! In addition, Arcueid, Ciel and other characters also get involved... This is an introductory manga to help you enjoy playing 'Melty Blood: Type Lumina'!

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.th: นายเงือกของเดซาโรว

description.en:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

altTitles.ja: 人外さんの嫁

description.en:
Hinowa Tomari is a normal high schooler, until one day he's told that he has to become the wife of a mysterious creature called Kanenogi.  
  
This is the start of their newly married life.

title.en: Saikin Haitta Shiro Madoushi ga Party Crusher de, Ore no Isekai Boukensha Seikatsu ga Houkai ni Kiki na Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.ja: 最近入った白魔導士がパーティークラッシャーで、俺の異世界冒険者生活が崩壊の危機な件について

altTitles.zh: 最近加入的白魔导士是队伍破坏者，给我的异世界冒险者生活带来了崩坏危机

altTitles.en: The White Mage Who Joined My Party Is a Party Crusher, So My Isekai Life Is at Risk of Collapsing Once Again

description.en: Toma was transported to another world due to an accident caused by a female circle crusher. So, he made friends in the new world and rebuilt his life as an adventurer. However, then, another girl joined his party... Will his life collapse once again because of another circle crusher who also exists in this new world!?
description.id: Toma tertransmigrasi ke dunia lain akibat kecelakaan yang disebabkan oleh seorang perempuan perusak sirkel. Maka, ia membuat teman-teman di dunia baru tersebut dan membangun kembali hidupnya sebagai seorang petualang. Namun, kemudian, seorang gadis lain bergabung dalam timnya... Akankah hidupnya runtuh sekali lagi karena perusak sirkel lain yang juga ada di dunia baru ini!?
description.ja: サークルクラッシャー女子の騒動に巻き込まれて死になぜか異世界に転移したソーマは冒険者として第二の人生を歩んでいた。そんな彼の前にサークルクラッシャーならぬパーティクラッシャーが現れた――!!

altTitles.ja: ペーパーブレイバー

description.en:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

description.en:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?
description.pt-br: Uma série de acidentes misteriosos acontecem um atrás do outro na cidade. Um ser demoníaco está desafiando a todos que os resolvam. Sumireko, uma aparentemente caixa comum de loja, deseja ser uma escritora e possui um corpo voluptuoso com muitos admiradores ardentes. Adashino, um admirador que parece com um jovem garoto é o caixa de uma livraria. Ele está mergulhado em mistérios, e de repente, o caminho pra ele e sua irmã voltarem para casa (em outro mundo) aparece. Uma história moderna de romance e aspirações começa!

title.en: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita

altTitles.ja: 理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。
リケ恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei Shite Mita

altTitles.en: Science Fell in Love, so I Tried to Prove It
I Tried to Prove That Science Fell in Love
Science Has Fallen in Love, so We Tried to Prove It

altTitles.fr: J'ai essayé de prouver que la science était tombée amoureuse

altTitles.ru: Наука влюблена и мы докажем это
Учёные влюблены и намерены доказать это научно
Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась

altTitles.th: พิสูจน์นิยามความรักด้วยหลักวิชาสายวิทย์

altTitles.zh: 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。
试证明理科生已坠入情网。

altTitles.zh-hk: 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。
試證明理科生已墜入情網。

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
description.ru: Химуро Аямэ и Юкимура Шинья ну просто обожают точные науки. Им надо, чтобы всё имело научное обоснование, ведь без этого нельзя быть уверенным ни в чём. Ох уж эти ученые, какие только эксперименты не придут в эти головы, чтобы доказать "любовь".

description.en: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

Geunyeong, infamous for his wild and reckless lifestyle, is a fake shaman trying to scam his way out of a huge debt. One day, during one of his fake rituals, a handsome man appears, begging him to stop, and then collapses. He quickly takes him to his shrine and they spend a passionate night together, only to discover that he's actually a goblin! He offers to pay off Geunyeong's debt in exchange for yang energy. Alright, the deal's on! #Reincarnation #Supernatural #PureHeartedTop #BeautifulBottom #PromiscuousBottom

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

altTitles.ja: 清田さんは汚されたい！？

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

title.en: Kozure Batsuichi, Saigo no Koi wa Numa deshita.

altTitles.ja: 子連れバツイチ、最後の恋は沼でした。

altTitles.en: Single Mother’s Last Love Was a Bog

description.en: A single mother who despises men is neighbors with a younger, womanizing man! Despite being scum, he is great at cooking and childcare--does that make him an ideal partner?
description.ja:
クズでスパダリな年下男子が、頑張るシンママの心を癒やす!!

シングルマザーの灯子は、誰にも頼ることなく、仕事と育児に大忙しな毎日を送っていた。ある日、過労で倒れてしまった灯子を助けたのは、隣の部屋に住む男子大学生だった。彼はイケメンスペック最強のスパダリ属性でちょっとクズ。男嫌いな灯子の最後の恋が始まりそうで──。

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.ja: セルフポートレイト

description.en: Getting influenced by an old anime "Rabbit Portrait", Usapo has sworn to be a strong and lovely girl! She rises up to save all the troubled girls who have lost their place of belonging! In a "game" that unfolds in extreme conditions, the true nature of human will be revealed! This is a dark and cute battle between the troubled kids!

altTitles.ja: 伊月くんは正されたい

description.en:
Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in — a senior, Ririko-senpai, the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her, he purposely messes up his uniform, but Ririko is always one step ahead—?! 

A heartwarming, dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!
description.pt-br:
Itsuki-kun está interessado em alguém... Sua senpai, Ririko-senpai, a presidente do comitê disciplinar! Em seus esforços para falar com ela, ele propositalmente bagunça seu uniforme, mas Ririko está sempre um passo à frente-?!

Uma comédia romântica juvenil, comovente e dedicada começa!

altTitles.ja: かさねがさねの初恋ですが

description.en: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

title.en: Loved by All When Rebirth: The Film King's Wife Is Poor and Fierce

altTitles.zh: 重生团宠：影帝夫人又穷又凶

description.en: Sheng Wenyin was deceived and died tragically in her previous life. She was reborn as the 18th-tier female star with a lot of scandals. This time, Sheng Wenyin stopped pretending and criticized the scumbag in various ways, which made her famous. Her biological parents, five brothers, and more than a dozen nephews and nieces came to recognize her as her relatives. She was also engaged to Qi Si, the nine-time Golden Award winner, as a child.

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

description.en:
Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. 

Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." 

Teacher and student… two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.

title.en: The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

description.en: The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. (Source: [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

altTitles.ja: マオ

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)
The story of a generation filled with romance and chaos.

title.en: I, Who Used to Be an Idiot, Was Possessed by an Idol?!

description.en: "Hyunsoo, who lived a decent life doing all kinds of odd jobs alone without parents, relatives, or siblings. He even did things like dumping things! Then one day, when he opened his eyes after a near-death experience... he had possessed an idol?! An idol? A member? The internet? At least 50 years had passed since Hyunsoo lived, so there was everything he didn't know. And on top of that, they were on the verge of disbanding...! In an instant, Hyunsoo, who had lost his way to live, appears in front of him the savior of the group 'Technician', Cha Soo-hyun. But this person... looks exactly like the master Hyunsoo used to serve...?!"

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.ja: 恋より青く

description.en:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.
